title: Creating a System of Equations From Relevant Variables
text: Using a to represent the number of pounds of Ground Chicory and $$b$$ to represent the number of pounds of Jamaican Blue Mountain, we know that $$a+b=12$$ since the total is $$12$$ pounds. Additionally, since we know the $$12$$ pounds cost $$\$6.25$$ per pound, the total cost is $$12\times6.25=\$75$$. Knowing this total cost, we can get our second equation: $$4.4a+8.84b=75$$.
